domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text:
@DrJoeAbah Only ionizing radiation(gamma rays, x-rays) can alter DNA.
5G (high frequency radio waves) cannot. 
That’s one thing.

Now blaming 5G for coronavirus is a reach of the highest proportions. An infectious disease off EM waves?
How? Why? 
This is the last thing we need tbh.
